bug.author: harrypotter90
bug.description: Docker image "v1.0.0b2 not found" Error message: docker pull nvcr.io/nvidia/nemo:v1.0.0b2 Error response from daemon: manifest for nvcr.io/nvidia/nemo:v1.0.0b2 not found: manifest unknown: manifest unknown

comments.comment: The docker image has been published and should be available now.
